00008 #include "ActiveNetworkConnectionManager.h"
00009 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00010 #include "MessageUtil.h"
00011 
00012 ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::ActiveNetworkConnectionManager(ros::NodeHandle& handle, NMClient* client) :
00013 m_handle(handle), m_client(client), msg_seq(0), connection_sub(
00014     handle.subscribe<NetworkConnections>("oryx_network_connections", 10,
00015         boost::bind(&ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::connections_changed_cb, this, _1))), devices_sub(
00016             handle.subscribe<NetworkDevices>("oryx_network_devices", 10,
00017                 boost::bind(&ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::devices_changed_cb, this, _1))), active_connection_pub(
00018                     handle.advertise<ActiveNetworkConnections>("oryx_active_network_connections", 10, true))
00019 {
00020   process_active_connections_changed();
00021   g_signal_connect(client, "notify::active-connections", G_CALLBACK(active_connections_changed_cb), this);
00022 }
00023 
00024 void ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::connections_changed_cb(const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr& latest_connections)
00025 {
00026   m_latest_connections = latest_connections;
00027   process_active_connections_changed();
00028 }
00029 void ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::devices_changed_cb(const NetworkDevices::ConstPtr& latest_devices)
00030 {
00031   m_latest_devices = latest_devices;
00032   process_active_connections_changed();
00033 }
00034 
00035 void ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::process_active_connections_changed()
00036 {
00037   ROS_DEBUG("Updating Active Network Connections");
00038   const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr connections = m_latest_connections;
00039   const NetworkDevices::ConstPtr devices = m_latest_devices;
00040   if(!connections || !devices)//haven't yet received any device and connection data
00041     return;
00042 
00043   oryx_network_manager::ActiveNetworkConnections ros_active_connections_message;
00044 
00045   const GPtrArray *active_list = nm_client_get_active_connections(m_client);
00046   for (unsigned int i = 0; active_list && (i < active_list->len); i++)
00047   {
00048     NMActiveConnection* active_connection = NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION(g_ptr_array_index(active_list, i));
00049     oryx_network_manager::ActiveNetworkConnection ros_active_connection_message;
00050 
00051     if (nm_active_connection_get_state(active_connection) == NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_ACTIVATED)
00052       ros_active_connection_message.connection_state = oryx_network_manager::ActiveNetworkConnection::ACTIVATED_STATE;
00053     else if (nm_active_connection_get_state(active_connection) == NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_ACTIVATING)
00054       ros_active_connection_message.connection_state = oryx_network_manager::ActiveNetworkConnection::ACTIVATING_STATE;
00055     else if (nm_active_connection_get_state(active_connection) == NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_DEACTIVATING)
00056       ros_active_connection_message.connection_state =
00057           oryx_network_manager::ActiveNetworkConnection::DEACTIVATING_STATE;
00058     else if (nm_active_connection_get_state(active_connection) == NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_UNKNOWN)
00059       ros_active_connection_message.connection_state = oryx_network_manager::ActiveNetworkConnection::UNKNOWN_STATE;
00060 
00061     const char* active_connection_path = nm_active_connection_get_connection(active_connection);
00062 
00063     if(!active_connection_path){
00064       ROS_WARN("Active Network Connections: path of an active connection returned NULL?");
00065       continue;
00066     }
00067     //get the connection info for this active connection
00068     std::vector<NetworkConnection>::const_iterator itr = connections->list.begin();
00069     for (; itr != connections->list.end(); ++itr)
00070     {
00071       if (itr->path == active_connection_path)
00072       {
00073         ros_active_connection_message.connection = *itr;
00074         break;
00075       }
00076     }
00077 
00078     //if there is a device retrieve the info about it
00079     const GPtrArray *active_connection_devices_devices = nm_active_connection_get_devices(active_connection);
00080     if (active_connection_devices_devices && active_connection_devices_devices->len > 0)
00081     {
00082       NMDevice* device = (NMDevice*) g_ptr_array_index (active_connection_devices_devices, 0);
00083       const char* iface = nm_device_get_iface(device);
00084 
00085       //get the device info for this active connection
00086       std::vector<NetworkDevice>::const_iterator itr = devices->list.begin();
00087       for (; itr != devices->list.end(); ++itr)
00088       {
00089         if (itr->iface == iface)
00090         {
00091           ros_active_connection_message.device = *itr;
00092           break;
00093         }
00094       }
00095 
00096       //get ip information if it's available
00097       NMIP4Config* ip4_config = nm_device_get_ip4_config(device);
00098       if(ip4_config)
00099       {
00100         const GSList* addresses = nm_ip4_config_get_addresses(ip4_config);
00101         if (g_slist_length((GSList *) addresses) && addresses->data)
00102         {
00103           char ip_address_str[20];
00104           guint32 ip_address = nm_ip4_address_get_address((NMIP4Address*)addresses->data);
00105           sprintf(ip_address_str, "%d.%d.%d.%d", (ip_address>>0)&0xFF, (ip_address>>8)&0xFF, (ip_address>>16)&0xFF, (ip_address>>24)&0xFF);
00106           ros_active_connection_message.ipv4_address = ip_address_str;
00107         }
00108       }
00109     }
00110     ros_active_connections_message.list.push_back(ros_active_connection_message);
00111   }
00112   fill_header_message(ros_active_connections_message.header, msg_seq++);
00113   active_connection_pub.publish(ros_active_connections_message);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void ActiveNetworkConnectionManager::active_connections_changed_cb(NMClient *client, GParamSpec *pspec,
00117     gpointer user_data)
00118 {
00119   ActiveNetworkConnectionManager* manager = (ActiveNetworkConnectionManager*) user_data;
00120   manager->process_active_connections_changed();
00121 }
